sentences.en: For this year at least, our race to circumnavigate the globe in less than 80 days is over.
sentences.cn: 至少今年，我们80天内环游地球一周的比赛已经结束了。

sentences.en: He plans to circumnavigate the world in a helium balloon.
sentences.cn: 他计画搭乘氦气球环绕世界一周.

sentences.en: Request circumnavigation ( to circumnavigate ) 30 km right of track ( airway ) to avoid the thunderstorm.
sentences.cn: 请求向 航迹 ( 航路 ) 右方绕行30公里以避开雷雨.

sentences.en: Request circumnavigation ( to circumnavigate ) 30 km right of track ( airway ) to avoid the thunderstorm.
sentences.cn: 请求向 航迹 ( 路 ) 方绕行30公里以避开雷雨.

words.tran_cn: 世界一周旅行；周游世界
世界一周旅行者；周游世界者

trans.tran_en: to sail, fly, or travel completely around the Earth, an island etc
